mapper.select: select tsTitle from Test_Schedule where tsNo like #{yy} and tsTitle like #{tsClass} order by tsTitle
select qName from Qualification where qClass = #{qClass} order by qName

select count(eNo) from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where substr(eNo,1,3) = (select distinct substr(S_CODE,1,3) from SCHOOL where S_BONBOO = #{S_BONBOO})
and
qCode = (select qCode from Qualification where qName = #{qName})
and substr(eNo,11,4) like #{tsNo}

select count(ppNo) from PERSONAL_DATA where substr(ppNo,1,3) = (select distinct substr(S_CODE,1,3) from SCHOOL where S_BONBOO = #{S_BONBOO})
and
ppNo in (select eNo from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where qCode = (select qCode from Qualification where qName = #{qName}))
and substr(ppNo,11,4) like #{tsNo}
and pAttendance = 'Y'
select distinct substr(s_Code,1,5) placeNo, s_Gigwan s_Place from SCHOOL where s_Bonboo = #{s_bonboo} order by 1

select count(eNo) from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where substr(eNo,4,2) = (select distinct substr(S_CODE,4,2) from SCHOOL where S_GIGWAN = #{S_GIGWAN} and S_BONBOO = #{S_BONBOO})
and
qCode = (select qCode from Qualification where qName = #{qName})
and substr(eNo,11,4) like #{tsNo}

select count(ppNo) from PERSONAL_DATA where substr(ppNo,4,2) = (select distinct substr(S_CODE,4,2) from SCHOOL where S_GIGWAN = #{S_GIGWAN} and S_BONBOO = #{S_BONBOO})
and
ppNo in (select eNo from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where qCode = (select qCode from Qualification where qName = #{qName}))
and substr(ppNo,11,4) like #{tsNo}
and pAttendance = 'Y'
select s_Code from SCHOOL
select tsNo from Test_Schedule where tsNo like #{tsNo} order by tsNo

select count(*) from PERSONAL_DATA where #{tsNo} = substr(ppNo,11,4) and
#{s_Code} = substr(ppNo,1,8) and
ppNo = any (select eNo from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where qCode = #{qCode}) and
pAttendance = 'Y'

select count(*) from PERSONAL_DATA where #{tsNo} = substr(ppNo,11,4) and
#{s_Code} = substr(ppNo,1,8) and
ppNo = any (select eNo from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where qCode = #{qCode})
select distinct substr(s_Code,1,3) placeNo, s_Bonboo s_Place from SCHOOL
select distinct substr(s_Code,1,7) placeNo, s_name s_Place from SCHOOL where s_Bonboo = #{bonboo} and s_gigwan = #{gigwan} order by 1
select distinct substr(s_Code,1,8) placeNo, s_room s_Place from SCHOOL where s_Bonboo = #{bonboo} and s_gigwan = #{gigwan} and s_name = #{name} order by 1

select TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP.SNO sNo, QUALIFICATION.QNAME qName, EXAMINEE.ENAME eName, PERSONAL_DATA.PTYPE pType, PERSONAL_DATA.PSEAT pSeat, PERSONAL_DATA.PATTENDANCE pAttendance, PERSONAL_DATA.PNOTE pNote from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP join PERSONAL_DATA on PERSONAL_DATA.PPNO = TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP.ENO join EXAMINEE on TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP.EID = EXAMINEE.EID join QUALIFICATION on QUALIFICATION.QCODE = TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP.QCODE where TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP.ENO like #{sCodeTsNo} order by eno
select SUPERVISOR.SNAME sName, SUPERVISOR.SSID ssId from SCHEDULE_SUPERVISOR join SUPERVISOR on SUPERVISOR.SSID = SCHEDULE_SUPERVISOR.SSID where S_CODE = #{sCode} and tsno = #{tsNo} order by 1
